Address.value: 292 MADISON AVENUE,9TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10017-6318, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Getty Realty Corp is the real estate investment trust in the U.S. specializing in the acquisition, financing, and development of convenience, automotive, and other single tenant retail real estate. The company's portfolio includes convenience stores, car washes, automotive service centers (gasoline and repair, oil and maintenance, tire and battery, collision), automotive parts retailers, and certain other freestanding retail properties, including drive-thru quick service restaurants. It generates majority of the revenue in the form of rental income.

value.name: Mark James Olear
value.title: Executive VP, Chief Operating & Investment Officer
